Columns.Description: Verbosity level of log mapped to standard levels (Informational, Warning, Error, or Critical)
Columns.Name: Level

Columns.Description: Host where the application is running
Columns.Name: Host

Columns.Description: Application source from where log message is emitted
Columns.Name: Source

Columns.Description: Application Method from where log message is emitted
Columns.Name: Method

Columns.Description: Application logger used to emit log message
Columns.Name: Logger

Columns.Description: Application class from where log message is emitted
Columns.Name: ExceptionClass

Columns.Description: Complete stack trace of the log message in case of exception
Columns.Name: StackTrace

Columns.Description: The name of the operation represented by this event.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
